\lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaGroupRef
jump to top

Package: Default
Represents the group element with ref attribute from the XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C). This class is used within complex types that reference a group defined at the schema level.
Parent(s)
\lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaParticle < \lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaAnnotated < \lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaObject
Inherited_from
\lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaParticle
